Description: Lid of cartonnage mummy-case in form of woman wearing tunic and mantle; painted and gilded detail.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 61 [31]. Mark Smith in Bierbrie (ed.), Portraits and Masks, 1997, p. 66 [pl.7.1]. Albersmeier, Unterschungen zu den Frauenstatuen, 271 n.473. Riggs, Beautiful Burial in Roman Egypt (2005):62, 63, 65, 66, 70, 70 Fig. 24, 80, 81, 82, 262; 247 n.6 J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 147.
Fragments from the cartonnage are regsitered as EA 76489.
Bibliographic references: Riggs 2005 / Beautiful burial in Roman Egypt (no.14, fig.24)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
